titles.title: Lowell National Historical Park Boundary Adjustment Act
Lowell National Historical Park Boundary Adjustment Act
Lowell National Historical Park Boundary Adjustment Act
To adjust the boundary of Lowell National Historical Park, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks.
Mr. Radanovich moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 395.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Lowell National Historical Park Boundary Adjustment Act - Modifies the boundary of the Lowell National Historical Park to include certain properties in the City of Lowell, Massachusetts.
